verse.name: v1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Full salvation! Full salvation! Lo, the fountain opened wide, Streams through every land and nation From the Savior’s wounded side. Full salvation! Full salvation! Streams an endless crimson tide.{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Oh, the glorious revelation! See the cleansing current flow, Washing stains of condemnation Whiter than the driven snow: Full salvation! Full salvation! Oh, the rapturous bliss to know.{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v3
v4
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Life immortal, Christ descending, Lo! my heart the Spirit’s shrine: God and man in oneness blending, Oh, what fellowship is mine! Full salvation! Full salvation! Raised in Christ to life divine!{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v5
